code: import{dispatchHelper}from'../utils/utils';import{ADD_TAG,DELETE_TAG,GET_USERS_DETAILS,GET_MUTUAL_USERS}from'./types';export var getUserDetails=function getUserDetails(username){return dispatchHelper(GET_USERS_DETAILS,'get-users-details',{username:username});};export var getMutualUsers=function getMutualUsers(username){return dispatchHelper(GET_MUTUAL_USERS,'get-mutual-users',{username:username});};export var deleteTag=function deleteTag(tag){return{type:DELETE_TAG,payload:tag};};export var addTag=function addTag(tag){return{type:ADD_TAG,payload:tag};};
